help-file.title: "GOD, COMMANDS"
help-file.content:
The format to access help for god commands is structured as follows:
help god, <command>
Help on the following god commands and god information areas is available:
accept, decline, advance, advancement, at, cheating, clone, debug, demote, echo, echoa, echoz, finger, force, freeze, goto, grant, revoke, gshout, ingame, inroom, knowledge, levels, lightning, load, lookup, pardon, participation, pflags, poofin, poofout, ptell, purge, reinitphys, release, restore, secret, setattr, setbit, sethome, silence, snoop, snowball, spells, stat, string, supervise, switch, return, teleport, title, trans, users, vis, where, wizhelp, wizloc, wizmsg
